playing in sandbox 'cause something happen in my career saves..![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

Happy birthday cyberpawn ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also if you upload your career save and tell people what's wrong, someone might be able to fix it.
